|brand = Ubiquiti Networks |model = WiFiStation |submodelappend = yes |submodel = EXT |revision = <!-- Model Revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = |page_start_origon = |sernum = <!-- Serial number prefix --> |wlclass = N150 |series = <!-- Device series --> |if = USB |if_bus_version = 2.0 |ifconnector = Female Micro-B |formfactor = corded (modular) adapter
|vendor_id = 0cf3 |device_id = b003 |subvendor_id = <!-- Leave blank for none --> |subdevice_id = <!-- Leave blank for none --> |id_string = <!-- PnP ID string --> |windosid = <!-- Windows ID, Leave blank for none --> |fcc_id = SWX-M2USB |icid = 6545A-M2USB |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = <!-- Board ID --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id --> |oui = 00:15:6D, 00:27:22
|chip1 = Atheros;AR9271; |chip2 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |chip3 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |chip4 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; -->
|antconn = RP-SMA |antenna = <!-- Antenna type --> |txchains = 1 |rxchains = 1 |sstreams = 1 |wirelessstand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |802.11n = 150 |802.11g = 54 |802.11b = 11 |wififreq = 2.4 |receive_sens = <!-- Receive sensitivity --> |transmit_power = <!-- Transmit power -->
|linuxdriv = |windriv = a few of Ubiquiti's driver sets mirrored '''[https://deviwiki.com/files/Drivers/Ubiquiti/WiFiStation/ here]'''
|is_manuf = <!-- Yes, or No, --> |manuf = <!-- Manufacturer --> |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |addchip = 2.4GHz Power Amplifier IC;Anadigics;AWL6153;;1; ,,, EEPROM;ISSI;404A;ISSI, 014, 404A, -2GL1;1; |flags = high power |802dot11_protocols = bgn |accessible_UART = Yes |accessible_JTAG = |category =
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 05/25/2010 |estreldate = <!-- Estimated release date --> |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = 609722639033 |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = B003ZUB4NO |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = <!-- Country device was manufactured in -->
|powledcolor = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |connactled = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |spdledcolor = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |leddupcolor = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimmin = <!-- Size of device --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device -->
}}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== *[http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=o9vh-131f-U A video showing internals] :This device uses an [http://www.anadigics.com/products/view/awl6153 '''ANADIGICS''' AWL6153 PA module].
OUI: 00:15:6D:82, 00:27:22:12 :With UART port.
==Links of Interest== :[http://www.ubnt.com/downloads/wifistation_datasheet.pdf Datasheet]
